QuestData.Title: Flight Training: Ring Round-Up
QuestData.Description: Now that your serpent is fully grown, you are ready to begin flight training.$B$BAs with all novices, you must start at the beginning.$B$BYour first task is simple. Fly through 6 of the cloud rings between the spires to the east.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly through 6 cloud rings while riding your cloud serpent.
